name: Csv2SQL
short_description:
Provides a no-shrills interaction to generate SQL queries based on arbitrary basic inputs such as CSV. 

After extracting, just double click on the CSV2SQL.jar file and choose a CSV file to generate SQL out of. Output should show on the next screen. That's it!
summary: Transform CSV to flat ready-to-import SQL output.
